attributes.action: Re-instate the independant Kingdom of Sussex, with all citizens turning to face Lewes at 4pm daily to swear allegiance to King Osmund the last crowned monach of Sussex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The kingdom of Sussex was invaded in 762ad by Offa of Mercia and this petition is to re-instate the kingdon

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
